#TITLE Battle With Magus
#ALBUM Chrono Trigger
#COMPOSER Yasunori Mitsuda
#ARRANGED Tsushiy
#TRANSCRIPTION N/A

#WAVE 0x20 0x13 ## synth strings (FF4)
#WAVE 0x21 0x5E ## flute (FF6)
#WAVE 0x22 0x6F ## trumpet (CT)
#WAVE 0x23 0x58 ## french horn (RS3)
#WAVE 0x24 0x02 ## electric bass (FF6)
#WAVE 0x25 0x16 ## timpani (FF6)
#WAVE 0x26 0x12 ## cymbal (FF6)
#WAVE 0x27 0x8C ## metal bang (SMRPG)
#WAVE 0x28 0xE4 ## magus laugh (CT)
